features.html:
Quamquam in bello hominibus prodest ferrum, ex quo 

arma varia finguntur, tamen saepius invenitur in pace, 

ex quo stili, naves mercatorum, et currus.

choicesHtml: iron is more commonly used for peaceful purposes
metals are most important for making weapons to wage war
all elements of society use a variety of resources to support their defenses
people have consumed most of their natural resources, and this has caused conflict
